description.name: daibase
description.tagline: Dai Token base Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto base-dai Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Dai Token base directly on your website
Unique base/dai receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your base/dai wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
